EVTDESC_ZE_1011: Your daughter [FromFrom.GetFirstName] comes to see you. She is very unhappy with the arranged marriage: '[Root.GetFatherMother] - I do not love my new husband and I will not accept this! I implore you to annul the marriage!'
EVTOPTB_ZE_1011: Very well, we shall not force you.
EVTDESC_ZE_1012: As the wedding celebrations are being prepared, [From.GetTitledName] informs you that [From.GetHerHis] daughter will not accept marrying [target_spurned_spouse.GetTitledName], and [From.GetSheHe] has decided to annul the marriage!
EVTDESC_ZE_1120: There is a rumor among the servants that the tragedy which befell the late husband of your daughter [From.GetFirstName] was in fact caused by her. She supposedly poisoned him in his sleep.
EVTOPTA_ZE_1120: Who knows if such rumors are true?
EVTDESC_ZE_1130: You receive news that your daughter [From.GetFirstName], in a heated argument in the bedchamber, drew a sword and attacked and her spouse. He apparently managed to find a weapon to defend himself but she bested him in combat and killed him!
EVTDESC_ZE_1142: Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped! Worse, she seems to have made friends abroad and has settled in a castle in the realm of [From.Owner.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
EVTDESC_ZE_1150: Your daughter, [From.GetFirstName], has eloped, leaving her family and home behind! And you hardly believe your ears when you are told that she has banded up with scoundrels and criminals and formed a mercenary band, which she now leads!
EVTDESC_ZE_1180: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], I cannot abide your arbitrariness and tyranny, and your hypocritical abuse of the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] vexes me more than anything else. I spit on your religion and I turn my back on it!'
EVTOPTA_ZE_1180: I have raised a blasphemer and heretic!
EVTDESC_ZE_1190: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] could not abide her solitary and ignoble existence as a prisoner. Ever prone to choosing her own path, this time she has chosen to take her own life.
EVTDESC_ZE_1302: Your daughter [From.GetFirstName] comes to see you: '[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], [target_daughter_wants_to_marry.GetFirstName] and I love each other, and I demand you allow us to marry.'
EVTOPTA_ZE_1302: Of course my dear, if that is what you desire.
EVTOPTB_ZE_1302: Do not ask such absurd things of me.
EVTDESC_ZE_4000: Your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName], has come to you with a suggestion: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], it is my opinion that [recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetTitledNameWithNick] would make an excellent military commander. I suggest we make use of [recommended_for_marshal_ze_4000.GetHerHis] talents for the good of the realm.
EVTOPTB_ZE_4000: No, I have other candidates in mind.
disloyal_peasantry_desc: Someone or something has stirred up disloyal sentiments towards the ruler among the peasants of the realm
spiritual_refused_pagans: Refused to Preach Among the Pagans
spiritual_refused_pagans_desc: This character, while a [GetLordSpiritualName], refused to proselytize in Pagan realms, deeming it much too dangerous.
EVTDESC_ZE_5000: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] approaches you with a request: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I want your permission to travel to the Pagan lands and spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith among those unfortunate people. It shall be for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].'
EVTOPTA_ZE_5000: Your zeal does you credit. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] be with you.
EVTOPTC_ZE_5000: No, I will not allow it.
EVTDESC_ZE_5010:
My [Root.GetLordLady],

I would like us to invest in building a great temple for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I will contribute from my own purse to the construction costs.

Ever in service of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
EVTOPTB_ZE_5010: It would be a waste of money.
EVTDESC_ZE_5020: Strange news reach your ears. Apparently, one of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!
EVTDESC_ZE_5022: It seems another of your courtiers has converted to the [ze_5020_province.Religion.GetName] faith!
EVTOPTA_ZE_5022: Something strange is going on here...
EVTDESC_ZE_5027: A number of incriminating letters have been found. They are from your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], addressed to various members of your court, praising the simple virtues of the [Root.job_spiritual.Location.Religion.GetName]s and contrasting them with the tired, decadent ways of the [Root.Religion.GetName]s. This surely explains the recent outbreak of vile flirting with heathenry at your court!
EVTOPTB_ZE_5027: If this madness stops now, I shall forgive.
EVTDESC_ZE_5030: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledNameWithNick], has been discovered charging money for various religious favors, putting the gold in [Root.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] own pocket.
EVTDESC_ZE_5040:
My [Root.GetTitle],
I find life here among the heathens both wretched and dangerous, and I am convinced that they are both blind and deaf to the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. I plead with you to allow me to return home where I can do more useful work for the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Your loyal servant,
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTOPTB_ZE_5040: The whining coward will be of no use there anyway.
EVTDESC_ZE_4010: Your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName], has put forward a plan for experimentation with new military technology, inspired by a supposedly brilliant inventor and engineer that [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has recently befriended. All that is needed is a little funding...
EVTDESCA_ZE_4020: You receive a report from the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a large steel-plated chariot was constructed, propelled by ten men inside pulling it forward, directed by a commander peering out from a revolving turret mounted on top. This vehicle also had several ballistas firing through arrow slits. Though ending up being too slow (and expensive) for actual wartime employment, it still provided some valuable lessons.
EVTDESCB_ZE_4020: You receive a report from the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a large steel-plated chariot was constructed, propelled by ten men inside pulling it forward, directed by a commander peering out from a revolving turret mounted on top. This vehicle also had several ballistas firing through arrow slits. Unfortunately, its weight caused a wooden bridge to collapse when crossing and the invention was lost in the river, also killing the engineer. The [Root.GetMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetHerselfHimself] barely escaped with [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] life.
EVTOPTA_ZE_4020: I'm glad something came out of the investment.
EVTDESCA_ZE_4030: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a new kind of self-propelled arrow was tried out, based on Far Eastern models. Lit by fire, these arrows would scream and fly away leaving a trail of smoke and then explode on impact, killing several of the livestock used as practice targets. Though of dubious accuracy and prone to failure in rainy weather, these experiments have still provided some valuable lessons.
EVTDESCB_ZE_4030: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, a new kind of self-propelled arrow was tried out, based on Far Eastern models. Lit by fire, these arrows would scream and fly away leaving a trail of smoke and then explode on impact, killing several of the livestock used as practice targets. Unfortunately, on the second trial, several of these missiles misfired, one striking the engineer dead and another nearly killing the [Root.GetMarshalName].
EVTDESC_ZE_4040: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, the experiments consisted in training an large force of musicians to blow their trumpets in unison, thus deafening and stunning the enemy army in preparation for an attack. Attempts were also made to make castle walls tumble by marching around them blowing the trumpets.\n\nUnfortunately, while quite expensive, none of these experiments were successful.
EVTOPTA_ZE_4040: Trumpets? How much did I pay for this again...?
hard_of_hearing_desc: This character has suffered damage to [GetHerHis] eardrums, affecting [GetHerHis] ability to communicate with others.
EVTDESC_ZE_4050: You receive a report on the outcome of the military experiments that your [Root.GetMarshalName] asked you to sponsor. Apparently, the experiments consisted in drenching a large amount of sheep in oil and setting fire to them, then sending the terrified, screaming animals towards the enemy. Unfortunately, it proved impossible to control the direction of the sheep. The engineer was immolated in a ball of fire and your [Root.GetMarshalName] barely escaped with [Root.GetHerHis] life.
EVTOPTA_ZE_4050: It seems we'll be dining roast mutton...
EVTDESC_ZE_4100: You receive news of your [Root.GetMarshalName]'s activities in [Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName]. It appears [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has been spreading ill words about your rule, encouraging disloyalty among the peasantry!
EVTOPTB_ZE_4100: Ill tidings, but I still need [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_ZE_4120: Worrying reports have reached you regarding your [Root.GetMarshalName], [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHe] has been using your soldiers to extort money from the peasantry in [Root.job_marshal.Location.GetName].
EVTOPTB_ZE_4120: I will deal with this later.
highway_robber_band_desc: A large band of robbers is prowling the countryside.
thieves_guild_desc: The amount of thieves preying upon the people of this county is enormous.
action_fabricate_claims_desc: Send your [GetChancellorName] to fabricate claims on landed titles held by local rulers. A highly skilled [GetChancellorName] may even fabricate a claim on a duchy. Only with the Become King ambition is it possible to fabricate a claim on a kingdom.
obj_gain_any_title_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to acquire more land and another title, increasing [This.GetHerHis] influence and power in the realm.
EVTDESC63041:
My liege!
Loyal servants such as I surely deserve some recognition and rewards from time to time. It is widely known that you hold huge lands and many titles, and are as generous as you are wise. Perhaps you would consider granting this humble servant the [vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName]?

Your vassal, [From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTB63041: This greed does not become you.
EVTOPTC63041: I would be happy to grant you this deserved reward, but...
EVTDESC63042:
My dear vassal,

You are a devoted servant, and I have decided to reward you. Please accept the [vassal_wanted_title.GetFullName] as a token of my love and your loyal service.

Your liege, [From.GetTitledName]
demand_liege_title_desc: My liege holds many titles. As a loyal vassal, surely he could spare me some land...
EVTDESC_ZE_9000: As the war rages on, you find that your so-called ally, [ally_not_active_in_war.GetTitledNameWithNick], has been inactive for several years, not taking any offensive action to support you.
EVTOPTA_ZE_9000: [ally_not_active_in_war.GetSheHeCap] has failed me for the last time.
EVTOPTB_ZE_9000: I'll just pretend I didn't notice.
EVTDESC_ZE_9001:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
It pains me greatly to have to tell you that I have noticed the absence of your armies on the field of battle while the war is being fought by others. As I have no need for cowardly and treacherous allies, you may henceforth consider our alliance void.

With the hope of your speedy demise,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_9100: Pirates have been marauding in increasing numbers all along the coast of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] recently. Worse, there is a rumor among the common folk that the pirates are being aided by [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] agents.
EVTOPTA_ZE_9100: I must send a letter to the [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] [pirate_alliance_friction_ally.GetTitle] and find out if it so.
EVTDESC_ZE_9101:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We are experiencing a plague of pirates on our coasts, and there is a rumor that you are supporting them. Can you please put my mind at ease regarding this, for I assume that it is not true. Or is it...?

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTB_ZE_9101: A strange accusation. [From.GetSheHeCap] is up to something...
EVTDESC_ZE_9110:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It grieves me to hear of your troubles. However, I can assure you that I have nothing to do with the pirates that plague your coasts.

Regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_9110: Ah, that puts my mind at rest.
EVTDESC_ZE_9111:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are a [GetFromRootInsult] and a liar and I will have you know that our pact has been broken through no fault of mine but through your treacherous actions.

May your days be filled with deserved misery,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_9120:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I must say I do not approve of the tone in your last letter. Accusing others to try and obscure your own failings in keeping your realm safe only leaves you looking like a [GetFromRootInsult].

I wish you a speedy recovery from your paranoia,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_9120: Oh dear... I should try to repair this...
EVTDESC_ZE_9121:
Esteemed [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It distresses me that you perceived my earlier letter as accusing you and questioning your honor, as that was not my intention. Please accept my sincerest apologies for this misunderstanding, and rest assured that I do not suspect you of involvement in piracy.

With hopes of continued friendship,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_9121: I see now that [From.GetHerHis] intentions were honorable.
EVTOPTB_ZE_9121: I must distance myself from this [GetRootFromInsult] snake.
EVTDESC_ZE_9122:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I accept your apology and look forward to many more years of continued good relations.

With my kindest regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_9123:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Lamentably, your words of apology do not ring true. I am no fool, and a trust that has been broken cannot be repaired with mere empty words. I cannot maintain a pact under such circumstances.

With scant pleasure,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_9123: Very well, if it must be so.
EVTDESC_ZE_9130:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your aggressive words only serve to strengthen my suspicions regarding your low character and propensity to underhanded dealings. Clearly you planning some dark deed. I demand that you cease at once.

With reluctant regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_9130: I should back down before this breaks our relationship.
ze_9130_apology: Admit to wrongdoing and send apology.
EVTOPTB_ZE_9130: May the cur choke on [From.GetHerHis] foul tongue!
EVTDESC_ZE_9131:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are quite right that I have erred in my ways. However, after pondering my faults and considering what a [GetFromRootCompliment] you are, I am now fully committed to seeing you prosper and to preserve our good relationship. I convey to you my sincere and humble apologies.

With the greatest respect and admiration,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_9132:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],

You are the worst kind of scum to frame and then attack in such a vile way those who have been so loyal and steadfast towards you. You are a [GetFromRootInsult] and I would not wish upon anyone the misfortune of making pacts or agreements with you.

Sincerely and disappointedly,
[From.GetTitledName]
ASSIGN_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_0: Select an honorary title to grant to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
ASSIGN_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_2: This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$.
ASSIGN_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_DESC: Appoint a character to be on your council with an honorary title.
ASSIGN_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: You can hand out honorary titles that come with a seat on your council attached to it to your vassals to appease them and prevent them from joining factions against you.
ASSIGN_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_LETTER: \n\nI would like to give you a seat on my council and therefore offer you the title of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!.
REVOKE_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_DESC: Fire a character from your council
REVOKE_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: You can revoke a Councillor title from a character, thus removing them from the Council.
REVOKE_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_0: Select a title to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
REVOKE_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_2: This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by §R$OPINION|+$§!.
REVOKE_VOTER_TITLE_INTERACTION_ACCEPT_LO: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! revoked the title of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! from §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!, dismissing [Recipient.GetHerHim] from the council
experimenter_desc: This character favors a direct approach and prefers leaving advanced manoeuvres to others.
multilingual_desc: This character has mastered many languages.
EVTDESC_ZE_2021: I can't stand it any more! Every time we have a visitor from another realm in the court of the [From.GetTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName] makes a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself] trying to impress our visitors with [From.GetHerHis] non-existent knowledge of foreign languages.
EVTDESC_ZE_2022: My [Root.GetChancellorName] [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName] kindly suggests that it would be of benefit to the realm if I studied the languages spoken at foreign courts. [language_teacher.GetSheHeCap] also offers [language_teacher.GetHerselfHimself] to aid me in my studies.
EVTOPTB_ZE_2022: If they can't speak [Root.Culture.GetName] they are not important.
EVTDESC_ZE_2024: Without the support of [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName], your study sessions seem to be few and far between. You increasingly feel that the challenge is just too great to tackle on your own.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2024: At least I made an effort.
EVTDESC_ZE_2025: Your determination and hard work has paid off. Studying with [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName], you have learned several new languages to a decent level of fluency. This will surely increase your prestige at foreign courts!
EVTOPTA_ZE_2025: I knew I could do it!
EVTDESC_ZE_2026: Distractions seem to overwhelm you during your studies. The simplest pleasures, and even plain and mundane chores, seem like time better spent than drowning in books all evening. How does one manage to keep focused when everything else is so much more appealing?
EVTOPTA_ZE_2026: If I learn even a few phrases, it will be worth it!
EVTOPTB_ZE_2026: I guess learning languages is not for everyone.
EVTDESC_ZE_2027: [Root.GetChancellorName] [language_teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has a look of parental disappointment in [language_teacher.GetHerHis] eyes. 'I believe you could have done this well if only you'd put your mind to it. Unfortunately your disinterest is all too apparent in your absence from our meetings. With your permission, I will henceforth focus on more useful work instead of waiting for you, my Liege.'
EVTOPTA_ZE_2027: You will watch your tongue or lose it!
EVTOPTB_ZE_2027: Although I learned less than expected, I thank you for your time.
EVTDESC_ZE_2061A: Being a Council Member is a powerful, almost intimidating feeling. The authority, the impact of your decisions across the realm. Inside the circle of trust, so close to this unreal amount of money, one wonders - if some of the gold were to disappear, would anyone even notice?
EVTOPTA_ZE_2061: I can take some, I deserve it.
EVTDESC_ZE_2062A: Curious, I was as pleased as always when I saw the amount of coin in the coffers this morning. But looking at it now, the amount seems somehow... less. Could it be that someone is stealing from me?
EVTDESC_ZE_2062B: Going through the treasury to account for today's earnings, it seems to me that the coffers seem to contain less than what we started out with today. Either someone is stealing my gold or I must be going mad.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2062: When I catch the thieving little rat...
EVTOPTB_ZE_2062: First they take my gold, and then what?
EVTDESC_ZE_2063A: As you pass by the treasury, you stumble upon [From.GetTitledFirstName] digging through the coffers. You must have been quiet as [From.GetSheHe] looks very surprised. So this is where the missing gold has gone.
EVTDESC_ZE_2063B: You close the door to your chamber, and as you approach your personal gold coffer you spot someone hiding behind it. A well aimed kick makes [From.GetTitledFirstName] squirm and the sound of what may be broken ribs accompanies [From.GetHerHis] scream of agony.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2063: Let [From.GetHerHim] go in exchange for a favor.
EVTDESC_ZE_2064: Your [Root.GetTreasurerName] [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] has also noticed that coins are missing but has concluded that your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName] is the only one that could've stolen it.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2064: Make [From.GetHerHim] swear to never do it again.
EVTDESC_ZE_2065: I have been caught stealing from the coffers of my Liege. But [From.GetSheHe] has been kind enough to let me go with a warning. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that I owe [From.GetHerHim] a favor, however.
EVTDESC_ZE_2066: I was caught stealing from the coffers, but was fortunate enough to be let go with a warning.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2075: It can't hurt to be a little safer.
EVTDESCA_ZE_2076: Earlier today, my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] presented [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis] plan to catch any sneaky spies at court. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] has weakened the floorboards in strategic places to make sure a creaking noise is always heard when someone moves around during the night.
EVTDESCB_ZE_2076: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] is trying out [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHis] new plan to get rid of intruders. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] has been splashing soap on all of the floors to make it more hazardous to move around.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2076: Now if only I could get rid of this terrible headache.
EVTDESCA_ZE_2077: As I entered the gates I was greeted by a large barking dog. My horse was frightened and started to rear. I was just about to draw my blade to slay the beast when I saw my [Root.GetSpymasterName], [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName], come running, shouting: "Bad dog! This is our friend that we're supposed to protect." The dog then stopped barking and rolled around placidly on its back.
EVTDESCB_ZE_2077: There's litter and feathers all over the place and when you enter the dining hall you see a huge pelican standing on the table. When [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] sees my steaming face [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] tries to calm me down, introducing me to the new 'Pelican Guard'.
EVTOPTB_ZE_2077: It bit me! Get rid of it!
EVTOPTC_ZE_2077: It bit my sister! Get rid of it!
EVTDESC_ZE_2078: [GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] presents a strange concoction to me. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] places a peg on my nose and forces me to drink the vile concoction while mumbling something that this will help keep away the forces that lurk in the shadows.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2078: Eugh! My mouth reeks of garlic.
EVTDESC_ZE_2080: When I walk into the office of my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] I find [safety_measure_spymaster.GetHerHim] carving huge and sharp stakes which [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] tells me will help bring down any intruder that dares to trespass. The enthusiastic smile on [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]'s face gives me an eerie feeling.
EVTDESC_ZE_2081: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] told me [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHe] had something exciting to show me. I was left unimpressed when it turned out to be a vial of ordinary water. [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] then told me that this 'blessed water' can drive away our enemies. The small donation demanded by the supplier had apparently already been taken care of.
EVTDESC_ZE_2083: I heard shouting down the corridor and when I came around the corner I see [spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] loudly arguing with my [Root.GetSpymasterName] [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName]. Clearly outraged, [spiritual.GetFirstName] explained to me that [safety_measure_spymaster.GetFirstName] tried to convince [spiritual.GetHerHim] to declare the entire building sacred ground.
EVTOPTB_ZE_2083: [safety_measure_spymaster.GetSheHeCap] was just joking. I hope you understand.
EVTOPTC_ZE_2083: Surely, for the correct sum this can be arranged?
EVTDESC_ZE_2071: [blackmailed_target.GetTitledFirstName] has brought up a grave problem [blackmailed_target.GetSheHe] has with your [GetSpymasterName] [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. [job_spymaster.GetFirstName] has been using the realm's spies to go snooping about in the personal quarters of [blackmailed_target.GetFirstName] for [job_spymaster.GetHerHis] own personal gain.
EVTOPTB_ZE_2071: Remind [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] to act in the shadows but take no direct actions.
EVTDESC_ZE_2030: While walking down the corridor a local peasant runs up to me with panic in his eyes: 'I came here to ask for aid since some of my sheep got killed by wild animals but now I just need to get out of here. I've already paid a dozen fees and been stuck in different rooms for hours in supposed 'queues' but I saw no-one else there. Please help my poor soul!'
EVTOPTA_ZE_2030: Put [Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName] in prison for [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] bureaucratic scheme.
EVTOPTB_ZE_2030: I'll let [Root.job_chancellor.GetFirstName]'s scheme slip by for now.
prepared_home_desc: This character has had [GetHerHis] home prepared to make it hard to sneak around unnoticed.
guard_dogs_desc: This character has acquired dogs trained to identify strangers sneaking around.
sanctuary_desc: It has been declared that this character's home is built on holy ground.
EVTDESC1029: Something I thought I had suppressed and finally subdued has risen inside me. Unchaste thoughts have begun to appear in my mind
EVTDESC_ZE_2028: [From.GetTitledFirstName] took offense at your offer of helping [From.GetHerHim] with [From.GetHerHis] language studies.
EVTOPTA_ZE_2028: [From.GetHerHisCap] bad manners won't do [From.GetHerHim] any good.
EVTDESC_ZE_2029: [From.GetTitledFirstName] expressed [From.GetHerHis] gratitude for my offer to tutor [From.GetHerHim] in the languages of foreign courts. [From.GetFirstName] also commended me for the extra effort I put in for the sake of the realm.
create_mercenary_company_feudal_desc: Gather some men under the command of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! and make them available for anyone to hire. You will gain part of the income that the company brings in when hired by another party.
INTERACTION_NOT_IN_WAR_WITH_TARGET: Is not in a war with §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
MAPMODE_TRADE_ZONES_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC1: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Patricians of $REALM|Y$
MAPMODE_TRADE_ZONES_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC2: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Patricians of $REALM|Y$
MAPMODE_DYNASTY_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC1: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Sub-Dynasties of $REALM|Y$
MAPMODE_DYNASTY_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC2: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Sub-Dynasties of $REALM|Y$
MAPMODE_GOVERNMENTS_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC1: Press §GControl + Left Click§! to show Sub-Governments of $REALM|Y$
MAPMODE_GOVERNMENTS_ONMAP_TOOLTIP_DESC2: Press §GControl + Right Click§! to hide Sub-Governments of $REALM|Y$
SELECT_FLANKLEADER_RETREATING: §RCannot select flank leader for retreating units§!
SPLIT_SAME: §RThere are no units to split off§!
SPLIT_SINGLE_SUBUNIT: §RCannot split units with only one subunit§!
NOT_HAS_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_WITH: Does NOT have a non-aggression pact with $NAME|Y$
INTERACTION_NOT_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT: Is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
INTERACTION_ACTOR_NOT_NON_AGGRESSION_PAC: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
INTERACTION_RECIPIENT_NOT_NON_AGGRESSION: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a non-aggression pact with §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!
NO_NON_AGGRESSION_PACT_FROM_MARRIAGE: We would get no §YNon-Aggression Pacts§! from the Marriage
GAINED_NON_AGGRESSION_PACTS_WITH: §YWould result in a Non-Aggression Pact with§!
MARRIAGE_TIES_DESC: The Pact is made with the following ties:
CANNOT_JOIN_FACTION_NON_AGG_PACT: §RYou are not allowed to join any factions as you have a Non-Aggression Pact with your liege.§!
LOST_NON_AGGRESSION_PACTS_WITH: §YWould result in ending the Non-Aggression Pact with§!
NON_AGG_PACT_DISSOLVED_LOG: The Non-Aggression Pact between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ has been dissolved as they no longer have any marriage ties.
LOWER_RELATIVE_INCOME_LIEGE: Income is less than §Y$VAL$%§! of liege.\n
HIGHER_RELATIVE_INCOME_LIEGE: Income is at least §Y$VAL$%§! of liege.\n
DISSOLVE_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_DECLINE_LO: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! refused to Dissolve the Alliance with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!.
NOT_WAR_ALLIES: Is NOT fighting a war together with §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
IS_NOT_VALID_ROMANCE_TARGET_OF: Is NOT a valid romance target of $WHO|Y$
IS_VALID_ROMANCE_TARGET_OF: Is a valid romance target of $WHO|Y$
ALLIANCE_DISSOLVED_LOG: The Alliance and Non-Aggression Pact between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ has been dissolved as they no longer have any marriage ties.
JOINED_WAR_ALLIED_LOG: $ALLY|Y$ has accepted a call to arms from $CALLER|Y$ against $TARGET|Y$. Due to an alliance, $ALLY|Y$ had no other choice.
JOINED_WAR_BLOOD_BROTHER_LOG: $ALLY|Y$ has accepted a call to arms from $CALLER|Y$ against $TARGET|Y$. Due to a blood oath, $ALLY|Y$ had no other choice.
SAME_REALM_CLANS: Are NOT nomad clans in the same realm
INTERACTION_REQUIRES_VALID_MINOR_TITLE_T: We have any honorary titles to revoke from §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
NOT_LIEGE_OR_VASSAL_OF: Is NOT any liege or vassal of $NAME|Y$
NOT_HAS_CB: $CHAR|Y$ does NOT have a CB against $OTHER|Y$
ADD_ALLIANCE_EFFECT_DAYS: Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ days.\n
ADD_ALLIANCE_EFFECT_MONTHS: Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ months.\n
ADD_ALLIANCE_EFFECT_YEARS: Gains an Alliance with $TARGET|Y$ for $DURATION|Y$ years.\n
EVTDESC_ZE_3000: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] beams a smile at you while handing over a pouch of gold. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] claims it contains the savings accumulated from hard work and donations from the richer families in your realm.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3001: We will have to make an example of [target_treasurer.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTC_ZE_3001: Understandable, collecting taxes is tough work.
EVTDESC_ZE_3003: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] reminds you of all the good work [target_treasurer.GetSheHe] has done lately. [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] thinks that with a fair compensation from [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] own pocket the [requested_province.GetFullName] is only a modest request.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3003: [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be repaid, but not like this.
EVTOPTC_ZE_3003: Are you blackmailing me? You'd be happy to keep your job!
EVTDESC_ZE_3004: [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you: 'My liege, I have a great idea for a monument. Something to raise our cultural status and make the people notice what a great ruler you are. I would require some gold and your patience, and the work would take a year to complete.'
EVTDESC_ZE_3005: The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. People have gathered to witness the unveiling of the new statue. It is a large portrait of [religious_head.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTA_ZE_3005: Surely, this will bring us the God's favor.
EVTDESC_ZE_3006: The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The shape of the statue seems a bit off, as it is unveiled some of the crowd seem confused. It is a giant ear with the inscription 'IT LISTENS'.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3006: Keep calm everyone! I am a snake!
EVTDESC_ZE_3007: The monument [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] promised is finished. The statue is unveiled and it's just a bigger version of [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], only slightly better looking than the real [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTOPTB_ZE_3007: Tear it down! [target_treasurer.GetSheHeCap] will be put in [target_treasurer.GetHerHis] place.
EVTDESC_ZE_3008: The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Some people in the crowd cover their children's eyes as the statue is unveiled. It's a couple in the middle of lovemaking, and not exactly presented in a tasteful way.
EVTOPTA_ZE_3008: Children must learn this sooner or later.
EVTDESC_ZE_3009: The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. At the unveiling, the crowd gasps and some even scream. It's something that resembles a throne, with an eyeless horned creature on top. It smells like blood.
EVTOPTA_ZE_3009: I should have seen this coming.
EVTDESC_ZE_3010: The monument promised by [target_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] is finished. Upon unveiling, a statue of yourself is revealed and you notice the crowd smiling and giving you a round of applause.
EVTDESC_ZE_3011: [steward.GetTitledFirstName] smiles at you. 'My liege, I have noticed your mind seems to drift off whenever we discuss monetary issues. I believe that to make things interesting, one must be introduced to the subject where it is directly relevant to oneself. Perhaps you would like to join me tomorrow on a full days work?'
EVTOPTB_ZE_3011: Hah! You must be joking, I have better things to do.
EVTDESC_ZE_3012: [steward.GetTitledFirstName] starts the day off collecting taxes. Some people frown and complain when they give away their earnings. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] calmly explains why taxes are collected and manages to appease the complainers.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3012: Maybe we could squeeze them for some more?
EVTDESC_ZE_3013: Today, [steward.GetTitledFirstName] brings you to the nearest construction site to evaluate progress. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] notices that the builders are lagging behind the agreed schedule and proceeds to question them. The builders complain about the weather and want more pay to cover the delays. [steward.GetTitledFirstName] looks over your way, awaiting a response.
EVTOPTA_ZE_3013: We will hold our end of the deal when you hold yours.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3013: I guess one cannot predict the weather.
EVTOPTC_ZE_3013: Clear the site! You will never work again!
EVTDESC_ZE_3014: A friend has come to visit [steward.GetTitledFirstName] this evening. The three of you have a good time discussing your experiences over a fine evening meal. The visitor nods at you, saying: 'How lucky you are, [steward.GetFirstName], to have a liege that understands your work. This cooperation should benefit the both of you.'
EVTOPTA_ZE_3014: It's been interesting, moreso than many other things I've tried.
EVTOPTB_ZE_3014: It wasn't for me, it feels like stealing.
EVTOPTC_ZE_3014: I hated it! We should just kill the peasants and take their money.
obj_become_council_member_desc: [This.GetTitledFirstName] would like a seat on the [This.Liege.GetCouncilName] of [This.GetHerHis] liege.
EVTDESC_ZE_6000: My hard work will not have gone unnoticed by my liege [target_liege.GetTitledName]. I am worthy of a position on the council and it's time I let [target_liege.GetHerHim] know.
EVTOPTB_ZE_6000: When [Root.GetRandomGodName] smiles on me, I will get my seat.
EVTDESC_ZE_6001: [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] expresses [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] wish to have a seat on the Council. [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHisCap] contribution to the realm is significant and [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHis] military strength is not to be ignored, so including [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim] in the Council may eliminate a potential future threat.
EVTOPTA_ZE_6001: I'll see what I can do.
EVTOPTC_ZE_6001: I would not bother you with such petty assignments.
EVTDESC_ZE_6002: It has been long enough since [target_liege.GetTitledName] promised to make room for me on the council. I could remind [target_liege.GetHerHim] to keep [target_liege.GetHerHis] promise.
EVTOPTA_ZE_6002: I'll be on the council in no time!
EVTOPTB_ZE_6002: [target_liege.GetSheHeCap] probably has a good reason for delaying.
EVTDESCA_ZE_6003: The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council position has been postponed long enough. [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHeCap] thinks it is questionable that [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName] is allowed on the Council when [aspiring_councillor.GetSheHe] isn't.
EVTDESCB_ZE_6003: The request of [aspiring_councillor.GetTitledFirstName] for a Council seat has been postponed long enough. Considering there is an open position, now would be the time to invite [aspiring_councillor.GetHerHim].
EVTOPTA_ZE_6003: Yes, it's time for a change.
EVTOPTC_ZE_6003: The council is for important people.
EVTOPTD_ZE_6003: Make up stories of slander by [councillor_target.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTDESC_ZE_6004: My request to join the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] will be considered.
EVTDESC_ZE_6005: The answer regarding a position on the [target_liege.GetCouncilName] of [target_liege.GetTitledName] was a definite no.
EVTDESC_ZE_6006: Although I didn't get a council position, I can rest assured that [target_liege.GetTitledName] knows I'm competent. In fact, [target_liege.GetSheHe] said that a council position would be a waste of my precious time.
EVTDESC_ZE_6007: [target_liege.GetTitledName] told me that [councillor_target.GetTitledName] has been slandering me! Of course my wise liege did not believe these lies, but the other councillors are worried, making it hard to give me a council position right now.
obj_land_for_son_title: Gain Land for an Unlanded Son
obj_land_for_son_desc: You wish to secure some land for a son that is currently not set to inherit any.
EVTDESC_ZE_6012: Your vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], is concerned about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] non-inheriting sons. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] asks you to consider them when looking for new vassals.
EVTOPTA_ZE_6012: I could use more good men.
EVTOPTB_ZE_6012: I can't give out land to anyone who asks.
EVTOPTA_ZE_8000: I'll write to [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. We could be friends.
EVTDESC_ZE_8003: Dear [Root.GetTitledName],\n\nI am glad to hear you are well and that my [target_ruler.GetHusbandWifeOpp]'s visit was a good experience. Unfortunately, in these times pacts are broken left and right and to avoid going back on my word in the future, I would rather not give this kind of guarantee. I hope you understand.
EVTDESC_ZE_8010: A petty noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName] has spent a week visiting [capital.GetName], constantly bragging about his wealth and estates back home, insulting his local peers and behaving like royalty. Your courtiers are quite sick of him and are asking you to take action.
EVTOPTB_ZE_8010_TOOLTIP: Your courtiers will not like this.
EVTDESC_ZE_8011:
Dear [target_ruler.GetTitledName],
We are having some trouble with one of your petty nobles who is visiting [capital.GetName]. His behavior being unacceptable would be quite an understatement, and I will have to take action soon.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_8011: I must show sympathy and explain.
EVTOPTB_ZE_8011: I will swallow my pride and take responsibility.
EVTDESC_ZE_8012:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I'm sorry to hear about your annoying guest. I can assure you that he is not a noble from [target_ruler_capital.GetName]. If this scoundrel still remains in [capital.GetName], I hope you deal with it soon.

 Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTB_ZE_8012: I'm no fool, I can tell he's from [target_ruler_capital.GetName].
EVTOPTA_ZE_8012_TOOLTIP: Send a letter of apology to [From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_8013:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I feel insulted that the first thing you do is accuse my people of being ill-behaved. Did you ever consider that he may be a fraud? Of course not, you [GetFromRootInsult].

All the best,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTB_ZE_8013: I will let this go, for now.
EVTDESC_ZE_8014:
My sincerest apologies [Root.GetTitledName], I realize that we made assumptions based on lies we were told and I hope this incident will soon be forgotten.

Kind regards,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC_ZE_8015:
[Root.GetTitledName],
I should have known you would try to worm your way out of this matter. Responsibility never came easy to you, you [GetFromRootInsult]. Consider our agreement a thing of the past.

I hope you catch the plague,[From.GetTitledName]
EVTOPTA_ZE_8015: This is no friend of ours!
EVTDESC_ZE_8016:
Dear [Root.GetTitledName],
I hope this person has not caused too much trouble. I will inform my people of your customs so that misunderstandings can be avoided when they visit your realm. Thank you for offering a chance to correct this behavior.

Best wishes,
[From.GetTitledName]
request_council_position_desc: I can ask my Liege, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, for a position on the Council. This can only be done once every two years.
EVTDESC_ZE_6013: My humble request to gain land for [chosen_son.GetFirstName] was successful. I no longer have to worry about him.
EVTDESC_ZE_6014: Unfortunately, my Liege could not find it in [From.GetHerHis] heart to give my son any land at this time.
EVTDESC_ZE_6015: My son [chosen_son.GetFirstName] will now have his own land! My Liege made sure to mention that I should remember this in the future when [From.GetSheHe] requires a favor in return.
obj_land_for_son_success_tooltip: Acquire a county for your son.
EVTDESC_ZE_8100: Upon the conclusion of a long council meeting you decide to make a toast. Of course, one toast eventually becomes many and time seems to slip away... Later, as you leave the council chamber, you stumble and fall on your face. You can feel the taste of blood in your mouth and dizzyness is setting in.
EVTOPTB_ZE_8100: No need to draw attention to myself right now, I think.
EVTDESC_ZE_8101: [From.GetTitledName] just left the council meeting but now you can hear a faint call for help. As you go outside you notice [From.GetTitledName] laying flat on [From.GetHerHis] face and all bloodied up. [From.GetSheHeCap] asks you for aid, and to be discreet.
EVTOPTB_ZE_8101: Call the others out and mock [From.GetHerHim].
EVTDESC_ZE_8102: You hear the voice of [From.GetTitledFirstName] just before you pass out. As you wake up the next morning, it feels as if your head is about to explode. But at least you are safe.
EVTDESC_ZE_8103: You notice [From.GetTitledName] standing next to you, [From.GetSheHe] seems to contemplate helping but is not responding to your pleads. Just before you pass out you see [From.GetHerHim] bringing the rest of the councillors out, and they look at you in pity before they help you.
EVTOPTA_38011: Give the money in exchange for a favor.
EVTDESC38016: [From.GetTitledName] approved your request but [From.GetSheHe] made sure to emphasize that this action is a favor to you and that you should remember it.
EVTOPTC38060: A generous offer for a favor.
EVTDESC38062: [From.GetTitledName] offers to help you out with your financial situation. [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to aquire some land in exchange for a very generous sum of money.
EVTOPTB38062: I don't like this kind of deal.
EVTDESC50009: [From.GetTitledName] has shown mercy and will release me, in return for a future favor.
EVTDESC63006B: My liege has agreed to transfer a vassal to me, but I will have to repay [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] later.
EVTOPTA63001B: [From.GetSheHeCap] can have a vassal, for a favor.
EVTDESC_ZE_8110: Your vassal [target_vassal.GetTitledName] is arguing with [target_vassal.GetHerHis] [target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp]. [target_vassal.GetSheHeCapOpp] seems quite upset and they are almost screaming at each other. They don't even notice that you are watching them.
EVTDESC_ZE_8111: As you approach the couple, you look at them both and explain that [target_vassal.GetFirstName] must have been under a lot of stress lately with all the responsibilities the council put on [target_vassal.GetHerHim]. Now there will be less to do and [target_vassal.GetSheHe] will have time to show [target_vassal.GetHerHis] [target_vassal.GetHusbandWifeOpp] some appreciation.
EVTDESC_ZE_8112: Me and my [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp] were arguing violently about insignificant matters but [From.GetTitledName] came to my rescue and my marriage may be saved because of that.
CHARACTER_DEBUG: Debug:\n§GCtrl-click to Play as this character\nAlt-click to Kill this character§!
UNIT_WILL_REINFORCE: This army is in friendly territory and will be reinforced with $REINFORCE|+0$ troops every month from its home settlement.
UNIT_NOT_REINFORCE: If in friendly territory, this army would be reinforced with $REINFORCE|+0$ troops every month. Closest friendly territory is $FRIENDLY|Y$ from its home settlement.
FORM_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: Make your relation even stronger by forming a proper Alliance.
FORM_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_DECLINE_LOG: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined the proposal for an alliance with §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
FORM_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_OFFER: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W wants to form an Alliance with us.
FORM_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_LETTER: \n\nWe should make our relation even stronger by forming a proper Alliance.
FORM_ALLIANCE_INTERACTION_01: Ask $WHO|Y$ if they want to form a proper Alliance.
HAS_CLOSE_RELATIVE_OR_NON_AGGRESSION_PAC: Is a close relative OR has a non-aggression pact with $NAME|Y$
COUNCIL_CHANGE_POSITION_COOLDOWN: You'll be able to change position again in $NUM|Y$ months.
COUNCIL_CHANGE_POSITION: It's possible to change council position by clicking the positions in the top of the interface.
COUNCIL_CHANGE_POSITION_CLICK: §GClick to change your position on the council to $POSITION|Y$§!
COUNCIL_CHANGE_POSITION_CONFIRM: After you've changed position, you'll not be able to change again for another $NUM|Y$ months.\nDo you want change your position on the Council to $POSITION|Y$?
BUY_FAVOR_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: Give a gift of gold to return a Favor or to receive a Favor later on.
CALL_IN_FAVOR_INTERACTION_DESC: Call in the Favor that [Recipient.GetBestName] owes you.
CALL_IN_FAVOR_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: Call in the Favor that [Recipient.GetBestName] owes you.
CALL_IN_FAVOR_INTERACTION_0: By calling in a Favor [Recipient.GetBestName] will vote as you do on the council for $MONTHS$ months.
OWES_YOU_FAVOR: $WHO|Y$ owes you a favor that you can call in.
COUNCIL_VOTE_AGAINST_LOG:
$INTERACTION$
The Council voted against it:
$COUNCIL_RESULT$
$CHARACTER_RESULT|Y$ voted against it.
COUNCIL_VOTE_ABSTAINED_LOG:
$INTERACTION$
The Council abstained from voting:
$COUNCIL_RESULT$
$CHARACTER_RESULT|Y$ voted against it.
OWED_FAVOR_ACTIVATED_BY_NOT_TRIGGER: $CHARACTER|Y$ did not owe an activated favor
HELD_FAVOR_ACTIVATED_ON_NOT_TRIGGER: $CHARACTER|Y$ did not hold an activated favor
AMONG_MOST_POWERFUL_VASSALS_TOOLTIP: Is among the top $VALUE|Y$ vassals in terms of powerbase.
MOST_POWERFUL_VASSAL_TOOLTIP: Is the vassal with the strongest powerbase.
NOT_AMONG_MOST_POWERFUL_VASSALS_TOOLTIP: Is not among the top $VALUE|Y$ vassals in terms of powerbase.
NOT_MOST_POWERFUL_VASSAL_TOOLTIP: Is not the vassal with the strongest powerbase.
LOOTING_FORBIDDEN_NON_AGGRESSION: Not allowed to loot due to non-aggression pact with $CHAR|Y$
IS_A_POWERFUL_VASSAL: §YIs considered a powerful vassal in your realm.§!
REVOKE_HONORARY_TITLE_OPINION: This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$.
REVOKE_HONORARY_TITLE_SPLIT_OPINION: This will change [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you by $OPINION|+$ ($TITLE_OPINION|+$ from losing the title and $REVOKE_OPINION|+$ from making [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] upset).
HAS_PARTICIPATED_IN_WAR_FOR_THE_LAST: Has actively participated during the past $DAYS$.
HAS_NOT_PARTICIPATED_IN_WAR_FOR_THE_LAST: Has not actively participated in the war during the past $DAYS$ days.
AIREASON_WAR_IS_EXPENSIVE: My war is costing a lot
AIREASON_WANT_TO_KEEP_FAVOR: I have better use for the favor
EVTDESC520: I graciously accept your gift and will remember your good intentions in the future.
EVTDESC521: You must understand that you cannot simply buy my loyalty like this. I refuse your gift.
VOTE_RESULT_FOR:
The council votes §Gyes§!.
$FOR|Y$ voters were for and $AGAINST|Y$ were against.
You have $TOTAL|Y$ seats in your council and a majority of those must be voting yes, with the liege breaking ties.
Empty seats are considered to be voting no.
VOTE_RESULT_AGAINST:
The council votes §Rno§!.
$FOR|Y$ voters were for and $AGAINST|Y$ were against.
You have $TOTAL|Y$ seats in your council and a majority of those must be voting yes, with the liege breaking ties.
Empty seats are considered to be voting no.
Going against the council will make them discontent, allowing them to enter factions. It will also be considered tyrannical and lower all your subjects opinions of you by $OPINION|R$.
VOTE_SWAYED: This voter has no particular opinion in the matter and has been swayed by the diplomacy rating of other voters.
REQUEST_SUPPORT_INTERACTION_DESC: Request support from [Recipient.GetBestName] in exchange for a Favor.
REQUEST_SUPPORT_INTERACTION_0: If §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! accepts your request [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] will vote as you do on the Council for $MONTHS|Y$ months and you will owe [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun] a Favor.
REQUEST_SUPPORT_INTERACTION_LETTER: \n\nPlease support me by voting with me in the council. If you agree to do this for me, I will henceforth owe you a Favor.
EVTDESC522: I will support you in the council.
EVTDESC523: I am sorry, but I just cannot support you in the council.
